about_the_game:
Exorkízein is an entity-hunting multiplayer co-op game. Immerse yourself in real-life haunted location replicas as well as folklore entities, each with its unique behavior and aspects. Join Theo's paranormal crew on a mission to investigate and capture entities around the world.


Using real life ghost investigation equipment and fiction capturing weapons we want to bring a full experience of the hunt, not only investigate but also capture entities.


Allow up to 32 people per lobby so you can get to know people before getting into missions to prevent trolls, also we are working to improve overall experience compared to other multiplayer games of the genre related to network and server prediction.


Starting with 24 entities half ghosts and half demons we based their features into real life folklore characters from different places of the world.


With 13 haunted location replicas, we aim to bring worldwide culture so everyone can feel identified with the game, and not only people from a certain geographical area.

content_descriptors.notes: Exorkízein contains strong language, intense violence, blood and gore material.

detailed_description:
Exorkízein is an entity-hunting multiplayer co-op game. Immerse yourself in real-life haunted location replicas as well as folklore entities, each with its unique behavior and aspects. Join Theo's paranormal crew on a mission to investigate and capture entities around the world.


Using real life ghost investigation equipment and fiction capturing weapons we want to bring a full experience of the hunt, not only investigate but also capture entities.


Allow up to 32 people per lobby so you can get to know people before getting into missions to prevent trolls, also we are working to improve overall experience compared to other multiplayer games of the genre related to network and server prediction.


Starting with 24 entities half ghosts and half demons we based their features into real life folklore characters from different places of the world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 | Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD Radeon RX Vega 8
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 10400 | Ryzen 5600G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 | AMD Radeon RX 5500
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
